Key Match Events: Memphis Grizzlies secured a 124-111 victory over Orlando Magic.
Yuki Kawamura made his appearance in the last two minutes of the game but missed both 3-point attempts and had a turnover.
Post-Match Reflections: Yuki Kawamura expressed his delight at the crowd's support and acknowledged he could have done more.
Ja Morant encouraged Kawamura to score his first NBA points.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Yuki Kawamura is the second Japanese player in Grizzlies' history, following Yuta Watanabe.
